message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to the right buyer.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I think the product's value is still worth more than $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's benefits and your initial interest.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $14000. I think the product's value is still worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $13750. This is the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm not comfortable going above $12500. I'm willing to pay this price for the product.
